betterquesting:10.desc:8:
You've been having strange visions lately... spires of gears and valves, spinning in an endless dance. You see things in these visions, technologies you do not fully comprehend.

You can create them, though. Pipeless steam... if such a thing were possible, you could accomplish almost anything.

[note]Use of the pipeless hatches will create a pipeless network, similar to a "wireless network", whatever that means. If you're in multiplayer, you may want to know these commands:

/gt global_steam_display <member>
/gt global_steam_join <member to add> <team member>
/gt global_steam_add <member> <amount> [type] 
type = (sc, sh, or type nothing for regular steam)
/gt global_steam_set <member> <amount> [type]

[/note]
